venue.name: The Alchemy Juice Bar & Growing Green Co-op

item.description:
The Hippocrates Life Change Program with Michael Bergonzi @ The Alchemy Cafe
Growing Wheatgrass & Sprouting

Hippocrates has been the foremost authority in the field of wheatgrass over the past 50 years and is offering a lecture about their living food/wheatgrass program as well as the ‘how to’ grow your own wheatgrass & sprouts for pennies a day. Get it fresh, it’s simple! Michael has been a master grower for the past 18 years and will give you the facts you need to sprout. Through the healing of mind and body, the Hippocrates Health Institute continues to teach their guests how to follow a healthier diet and have a higher consciousness in today’s busy society.

Wednesday, October 21st 6-8:30pm

Cost: $10 co-op members, $15 non-members RSVP

Information: Imani@thegreenvibration.com 860.983.5276
item.name: The Benefits of Wheatgrass
